original: PETERSOHN, Erik Gustaf Magnus, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Söderhamn 26/5 99 av lärov.adjunkten fil dr T A E Petersohn o Anna Jernberg, gm Astrid Afrell. Studex Norra Real Sthlm 18, KTH (skeppsbyggn) 19—23. Anst v flygkomp :s verkst Malmslätt 24—25, ass v Aerodynamische Versuchsanstalt i Göttingen 26—30, anst v Flygstyr :s tekn byrå 31—36, v Flygförvaltn :s militärtekn byrå 36, nu avd.chef v Flygtekn försöksanst i Ulvsunda. Av trycket: Art i in- o utl fackpress.
translated: PETERSOHN, Erik Gustaf Magnus, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, b. Söderhamn 26/5 1899, son of the teacher and PhD T. A. E. Petersohn and Anna Jernberg, m. Astrid Afrell. Graduated from Norra Real, Stockholm, in 1918, and from KTH (shipbuilding) in 1919-1923. Employed at the Air Force Workshop in Malmslätt, 1924-1925, assistant at the Aerodynamic Testing Institute in Göttingen, 1926-1930, employed at the Air Force Technical Office, 1931-1936, deputy chief of the Air Administration Military Technical Office in 1936, currently department head at the Aeronautical Experimental Institute in Ulvsunda. Published articles in domestic and international specialized press.
